messages.subject: Goto Mototsugu - force composition at Osaka?
messages.msgSnippet: Any ideas what Goto s force might have looked like at Osaka? Was he commanding Ronin or a clan force? It seems like after he left the Kuroda he was more of a
messages.messageBody:
Any ideas what Goto's force might have looked like at Osaka? Was he commanding Ronin or a clan force? It seems like after he left the Kuroda he was more of a Ronin Warlord?

Thanks!
Scott
